Title: Stormstout's Hops
Description: All three farmers have delivered their hops to Halfhill. Perhaps you should check in with Chen to make sure that he received them.
ObjectivesText: Return to Chen Stormstout in Halfhill.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Chen Stormstout at Halfhill in the Valley of the Four Winds.
RewardText:
Look at all these hops! This is quality stuff, too.

We're making headway, $n. Soon we'll have all the ingredients to finally start brewing.
